wikipedia_page.main: Kuldip Singh Dhillon (b. 1950), often known by the anglicised first name "Kolin", is a British Indian property developer and polo player and official. He is the chairman of Cirencester Park Polo Club.

response: Samuel Vestey, 3rd Baron Vestey (1941–2021) and his brother Mark both served as Chairmen of the club. The current President is Allen Bathurst, 9th Earl Bathurst (born 1961) and the current Chairman, Kuldip Singh Dhillon (born 1950).Official website: Club Committee
